oauth2.usage:
Usage: myecl [OPTION]
  login     Sign in with [OAuth2ProviderName].
            On the first time, links your [OAuth2ProviderName] account to your Minecraft account.
  unlink    Unlink your Minecraft account from your [OAuth2ProviderName] account.
  info      Show information about your linked [OAuth2ProviderName] account.
oauth2.notloggedin:
<red>You are not logged in.
Please log in with /myecl login to join the server.</red>
oauth2.noperms: <red>You don't have permission to use this command.</red>
